about_the_game:
Navigate through interactions with competing powers to lead your nation to global domination in this 4X open sandbox geopolitical sim set in post-WW2 alt-history world. You have 251 years at your disposal to conquer and unify the planet or take your nation into space. Can you make it?



Unleash your geopolitical prowess on a global scale. Create your own history by playing a time period commencing shortly after the end of WW2 and stretching far into the future. Your goal: unite the world under your control by eradicating your rivals or becoming an out of reach hegemon. Or choose an alternative path and open the way for an ambitious space exploration mission.






SHAPE THE WORLD THROUGH GEOPOLITICAL INTERACTIONS
Grow and apply your geopolitical power to compete for influence over neutral nations and annexing them to your expanding dominion. Liberate enemy nations from their shackles or play a darker hand and establish puppet governments to further your ambitions. Enhance your geopolitical influence by projecting economic, military or external power, enabling more advanced interactions in these domains.


BUILD A UNIQUE NATION AS YOU PLAY
Establish your nation with initial traits determined by its association with a particular civilization and ideology. As you progress over 251 years, your other choices will further shape a distinct nation with its own unique traits.


RESOURCE MANAGEMENT
Bolster your nation's geopolitical standing, economy, military, and external power projection by strategically allocating resources to develop your provinces and expand your global market share.


TECHNOLOGY
Explore real-world technologies from the latter half of the 20th and early 21st century, along with futuristic sci-fi advancements, to enhance your geopolitical, resource management and space exploration abilities.


SPACE RACE
Secure victory through an alternative route: embark on a space exploration mission rather than pursuing global dominance on Earth. Achieve this by utilizing a distinct space exploration mechanic, collecting vital unique space artifacts across the map, advancing space technology and constructing an exploratory spacecraft.


MAP EDITOR
Use map editor to craft your initial scenario, whether it involves pre-setting countries for a historical start or migrating your mega campaign from another grand strategy map game.

JOIN US ON DISCORD
